name: Dwarfpocalypse!
description:
Yer have got to be kiddin' me!

An FPS where you battle waves of dwarven horrors - with twitchy, fast-paced movement inspired by modern retro shooters.

Help Brick of the Beardsmith Clan defend their doomed fortress with nothing but their dwarvish grit, and trusty pick-gun! Will they escape with their life, or succumb to the unrelenting invasion?

Notice from the developer:
The game doesn't currently include sound effects - so feel free to pump up your favourite beats while you play. Thanks for checking this game out!
